description:
Tonoyasu has been strung up and is soon-to-be executed. The people of the Land of Wano recognize who he really is and start raising their voice while the Straw Hats rush to save him. Then, Tonoyasu starts addressing the nation and the corrupt Shogun Orochi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Sprint der Strohhüte! Die Rettung des gefangenen Tonoyasus
Ichimi Hashiru! Sukue Toraware no Tonoyasu
L`équipage s`élance. Il faut sauver Tonoyasu !
The Straw Hats Run! Save the Captive Tonoyasu!
Мугивары в действии! Спасти пленного Тоноясу!
اندفاع طاقم قبّعة القشّ! إنقاذ تونوياسو الأسير
一味疾[はし]る! 救え囚われのトの康
